name: Arkhosian Blademaster
text: The last blademaster of Arkhosia perished centuries ago, yet you have kept alive the memory of this noble tradition with your study of swordplay and your dedication to the ideals of courage and honor. Part knight, part pilgrim, and part kensei, you are a wandering swordmaster and battle captain in search of causes worthy of your skills. Your tradition isnâ€™t merely to face the darkness with sword in hand. You lift spirits and rally resistance, bolstering the courage of allies around you.

features.conclusiveAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, any ally who has line of sight to you gains a bonus to damage rolls against bloodied creatures equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn
features.resilientBlade(11thLevel): You increase the number of healing surges you have by two
features.battleRecovery(16thLevel): When you use your second wind, you regain the use of the lowest-level encounter attack power you have expended during this encounter

flavorText: We fight the good fight, knowing that it could take our lives.
